reviewText: What a great Korean drama!! Great acting! Kinda reminds me of a Korean oceans 11! Kim kang woo was amazing! I wish he had the main role! He so cute, he can come see me anytime!

I saw this years ago and had download it but my hard drive crashed and couldn't remember where I download it from. Then thought amazon might have it and they did so I ordered it. The drama was about a man who want's revenge against the man who cause his family business to close which leads his brother to commit suicide. The acting in this was really great and I would recommend this since it was the last drama that Park Yong-ha was in before death in 2010.
